column4: It usually doesn't take long with the really popular programs
But the not-so-widely-used programs take forever
ah
well, the current linux header kernel version is 2.6.23.12 and ubuntu 7.10 uses 2.6.22.14
what's wrong with the current kernel?
ah, current ubuntu kernel is from nov 21, so it's not that far behind
it'll download whichever one is in the repository
./configure
make

did ./configure work?
well, you need to install the dbus-glib package and then run ./configure again
